data.name: SATUS
data.detailed_description:
Easy mechanics, hard tactics


Create different units to fight! It's easy to manage big army, but it's hard to win.

Every unit has its own abilities. Magicians have bonus against virus, virus against dwarfs, dwarfs against dark side, dark side against magicians. Be careful

Manage your economy!


You should produce money and food. Every turn you capital consumes food. If you have no enough food for capital, you will die. Use money to build producing buildings(fror example crystal farms or beer factories)

Dangers are waiting for you
    Offers
  • Different buildings and units
  • Armageddon system
  • Angry skeletons
  • Interesting unique mechanics
  • Simple but interesting economics
  • Good mood

data.short_description: SATUS - global fantasy strategy, in which you can lead one of the 4 fractions: magicians, dwarfs, dark side, hell virus. Every fraction is unique. Capture all the enemies, arrange the end of the world, build a great empire!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any with 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any with 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
